name: PRIME EDUCATIONAL AND SOCIAL TRUST
briefDescription: Prime Trust since its inception in 2002, strives hard to make our women to be more self reliant by providing opportunities with social and economic empowerment. Prime Trust, provides micro credit, conducts awareness generation programs on HIV/AIDS, Nutrition, Health and Hygiene, Environment, Women Rights, Child Rights, Consumer Awareness. Prime Trust supports children in getting their rights by providing them opportunities to continue their education by sponsorship program and by running Evening Schools.
